attributes.action: Remove the right for Scottish MP's to vote on legislation at Westminster which will not apply to their Scottish constituencies because the responsibility for the matter in Scotland is with the Scottish Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe it is fundamentally unjust that legislation can be passed due the votes of MP's for constituencies where the legislation will not apply.  Only MPs for the constituencies where the proposed legislation will be applied should be eligible to vote.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
